name: Mech Shuffle
description:
Like Mechs? Like Deck Builders? Like Mech-Deck Builders!? Choose your MECH, choose your PILOT, and defend your planet from invasion using giant machines of war. Salvage improved weapons and defense systems for your MECH, learn new and improved PILOT skills, and make difficult decisions as you scout the battlefield and repel the invaders!





  • Perfect Information: use your knowledge of the battlefield and your opponents capabilities to plan your strategy.
  • Dynamic Deck Building: salvage new weapons and armour, upgrade your skills, abilities, and components, build a better mech!
  • Choose Your Path: will you engage tougher opponents for greater rewards, will you seek the safer routes?
  • Discover Powerful War Machines: every mech and pilot is unique, with special quirks and play styles.



Mech Shuffle is currently in Early Access, with tons of exciting content to come. Currently, Mech Shuffle includes the following:



  • 150+ Cards
  • 7 Playable Mech Packs
  • 7 Playable Pilot Packs
  • 5 Distinct Battlefields
  • Single Player Roguelite Campaign
  • PvP (Online Ranked Matchmaking)
  • PvP (Local / Steam Remote Play)
